title: 1  Introduction
text:
1.1 报错总结
resubmit content: step1: type git status in terminal next to console, submit file basing on the tips, then type: git commit -m "Initial commit" then type: usethis::use_github()will create a new 仓库, if you had this 仓库, you could push(click the bottom on the high-right side) you project in github directly, then, set the pages in github

title: 1  Introduction
text:
交叉引用没有对应的时候(在reference)里面对应就会报错,不能render book
连接不了github的token的原因是校园网,任何DNS的问题很可能就是校园网的问题.

title: 2  Summary
text:
In summary, this book has no content whatsoever.
